title: file share dialog doesn't appear
body:
hello, i've updated owncloud from 5.0.25 to 6.0.0.13 and ran into an error as described here #6313 i manually fixed this error as described in the comments (only noticing this here in case the below problem is related..)

now, when i go to the owncloud files section in my browser and click the "share" button on a file, nothing happens (the share dialog doesn't appear.)
when i enable the developer tools -> console, i see this error being logged:

```
20:42:39.872 get https://xxxx.nl/owncloud/index.php/core/ajax/share.php [http/1.1 500 internal server error 1315ms]
20:42:41.138 typeerror: data.reshare is undefined core.js:558
```
when i log in as the admin user, and create a new folder and file, the share dialog does appear, so it seems to be user related. both users are in the group admin.

please advise :)

server configuration

operating system: debian 3.2.46-1+deb7u1 x86_64 gnu/linux
web server: server version: apache/2.2.22 (debian)
database: sqlite3
php version: 5.4.4-14+deb7u5
owncloud version: 5.0.25
updated from older or fresh install: updated from 5.0.25 to 6.0.0.13
list of activated app: -
the content of config/config.php:
<?php
$config = array (
'instanceid' => 'xxxxxxxxxx',
'passwordsalt' => 'xxxxxxxxxx',
'datadirectory' => '/var/www/owncloud/data',
'dbtype' => 'sqlite3',
'version' => '6.0.0.13',
'installed' => true,
'forcessl' => true,
'theme' => '',
'maintenance' => true,
);

### client configuration
browser: firefox 26.0 & safari 7.0
operating system: os x 10.9
